de.javasoft.swing.filter
Class CollectionColumnFilter<M>

java.lang.Object
  org.jdesktop.beans.AbstractBean
      de.javasoft.swing.filter.ColumnFilter<M>
          de.javasoft.swing.filter.CollectionColumnFilter<M>

public class CollectionColumnFilter<M>
extends ColumnFilter<M>

A ColumnFilter for filtering against a single value in a list.

CollectionColumnFilter

public CollectionColumnFilter(int columnIndex)
Instantiates a CollectionColumnFilter for the given column.

Parameters:
columnIndex - the columnIndex in model-coordinates of the column to filter
Method Detail

setValues

public void setValues(java.util.Collection<?> values)
Sets the collection of values to choose the match value from.

Parameters:
values - the list of values to choose the match value from, must not be null.

setValues

public <T> void setValues(java.util.Collection<T> values,
                          java.util.Comparator<? super T> comparator)
Sets the collection of values to choose the match value from. The values are sorted with the given comparator, if not null or by their natural ordering if comparable. Falls back to ordering by the values's string representation if the comparator/natural sort fails.

Parameters:
values - the list of values to choose the match value from, must not be null.
comparator - the comparator to use for sorting the values, may be null to denote natural ordering of Comparable values

clear

public void clear()
Description copied from class: ColumnFilter
Resets the state of the filtering component to not filter and resets the column's RowFilter.

Specified by:

getFilteringComponent

public javax.swing.JComboBox getFilteringComponent()
Description copied from class: ColumnFilter
Returns the filtering component, guaranteed to be not null. This method must not be accessed after the filter has been released.

Overrides:
getFilteringComponent in class ColumnFilter<M>
Returns:
the filtering component.

matchValueChanged

protected void matchValueChanged()
Description copied from class: ColumnFilter
Callback method from listeners which detected a change in an input component which represent the matchValue. This must be implemented to update the rowFilterModel's matchValue from the current value/s of the input components.

Specified by:
matchValueChanged in class ColumnFilter<M>

createFilteringComponent

protected javax.swing.JComboBox createFilteringComponent()
Description copied from class: ColumnFilter
Creates and returns the filtering component (aka: the container to add into the filter row). This method is called once when the ColumnFilter's LifeCycle is in state INSTANTIATED. Subclasses must guarantee to have created and installed all internally used Components and Listeners.

Specified by:
createFilteringComponent in class ColumnFilter<M>
Returns:
the filtering component, must not be null.
